entry.title: CTV Meeting #5 Agenda (Tuesday, March 7th, 12:00 PT)
entry.summary: A CTV meeting is scheduled to take place tomorrow at noon PT, with an agenda that includes various topics. Firstly, there will be a 20-minute Sapio Taproot Support Update and Request for Review, which will discuss the experimental support for Taproot merged on master.Secondly, there will be a 20-minute session on Transaction Sponsoring versus CPFP/RBF, with links to relevant discussions provided in the agenda. Thirdly, Jamesob's Non-Recursive Vaults Post will be discussed for 20 minutes, with the link to the post shared in the agenda. Fourthly, there will be a 30-minute session dedicated to understanding some of the recent jargon being used on the mailing list, including EVICT, TLUV, FOLD, Lisp, OP_ANNEX, Drivechain Covenants, Jets, and more.Finally, there will be a 30-minute Q&A session where attendees can ask questions and engage in discussions. The meeting is open to all interested parties.
